amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Homeland Security and the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to collaborate with employee representatives in the planning, development, and implementation of any human resources management system.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 printed in House Report 107-615 to clarify worker rights in section 761 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quinn amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 227 - 202 (Roll no. 358).
